Building 'Intelligence as a service' platform

At YantrAI Labs, we are building a pure Intelligence-as-a-Service platform — a foundational AI layer that businesses can plug into to automate decisions, operations, and execution in the real world.

Intelligence is our mission, our product, and our entire roadmap. Our team, capital, and architecture are aligned around one objective: creating reliable, scalable, agentic AI systems that think, learn, and act autonomously.

We treat capability and control as twin engineering challenges. We push the frontier of applied AI while ensuring robustness, safety, and real-world reliability always stay ahead.

We are not a services company. We are not building short-term automation tools. We are building core intelligence infrastructure that compounds over time — intelligence that businesses can subscribe to, integrate with, and rely on.

Headquartered in India, we are assembling a lean, exceptional team of engineers and researchers focused on buildi
